name: Acme Synthetic Chemicals - Linoleic Acid 99%
description: Acme Synthetic Chemicals supplies high-purity Linoleic Acid (99% minimum by gas chromatography) for barrier repair formulations. This essential Omega-6 fatty acid is critical for skin barrier function and provides anti-inflammatory and moisturizing benefits. Affordable pricing with high purity standards for multiple applications.
notes: CAS 60-33-3. High-purity linoleic acid (99% minimum by gas chromatography). Essential Omega-6 fatty acid critical for barrier function. Linoleic acid deficiency is associated with increased transepidermal water loss and barrier dysfunction. Anti-inflammatory and moisturizing properties support healthy skin.
